alert.note: Alert for Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Loxahatchee NWR, or 17 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Weston, Parkland, Loxahatchee NWR, Mission Bay, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Whisper Walk, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Markham Park, Ramblewood East, South County Regional Park and Boca Raton Equestrian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
